headline.main: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case
headline.print_headline: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case

lead_paragraph: Attorney General Jeff Sessions has recused himself from an investigation into any ties between Moscow and President Donald Trump's 2016 campaign after revelations that he talked with Russia's ambassador to the United States twice during the presidential campaign. Sessions had faced mounting pressure from both parties on Capitol Hill that he step aside or resign.
